content:
As the tendrils wrap around her, Aylen feels a surge of determination. She had been able to grab the tendrils last time, and she was going to do it again. With a fierce determination, she reaches out and grabs hold of the tendrils, pulling with all her might. The thing is taken aback, surprised that she was able to break free of its bindings. Aylen doesn't stop there, she continues to pull and twist the tendrils, using all her strength to fight back against the thing.

The thing roars in anger, it's tendrils wriggling and squirming in Aylen's grasp. It lashes out with more tendrils, trying to bind her again, but Aylen is ready. She ducks and weaves, avoiding the tendrils as she continues to fight back. The thing's anger grows, it's smoke-like body writhing in fury as Aylen continues to resist.

Finally, with a mighty tug, Aylen breaks free of the tendrils and turns to face the thing. It's eyes are glowing with rage, but Aylen is not afraid. She stands tall, her chest heaving with effort, but her face set with determination. The thing can see that Aylen's fear has dissipated, replaced with a fierce resolve. It snarls, and vanishes in a puff of smoke, leaving Aylen victorious.
